pr_title: fixes #1705: Quote identifiers starting with a dollar character

timeline.bodyText: maybe makes sense trim the string?
timeline.author: conker84

replies.bodyText:
Thanks for pointing me towards this.
My intention was to have a test case for an identifier with a leading space because that's a valid identifier when quoted. But I just realized I should have rather used var as a test case for that. And then the test method needs fixing... That's what I just pushed.
Or did you mean something else?
replies.author: Phoosha

timeline.message: fixes #1705: Quote identifiers starting with dollar
fixes #1705: Quote identifiers starting with dollar
